title: [Large-Scale] Flipped Learning-Based Higher Music Education Course Design

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Knowledge in Musical Instrument Performance or Music Theory
context.additional_context: An intensive short-term course for corporate music education program managers/leaders to enhance their competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can design music theory and practical education content suitable for mobile environments using the flipped learning model.
Learners can produce and distribute pre-learning materials as 5-minute microlearning modules.
Learners can operate a personalized feedback system for each learner through project-based assessments.

resources: Musical Instrument Performance Video Production Kit

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
